name: Per Tempus
description:
Per Tempus was made using C# code in Unity Engine 2021.3.6f1 and was our entry for the Global Game Jam 2023 competition. The given theme was 'Roots', which we interpreted in the historical and familiar sense of tracing back one's own roots.

Credits:

Gus De Tommaso

Freddie Churchill

Billy Barber

Holly Moore

Defne Özden

Begüm Çıkrıkcıoğlu
